IoTSettings.name: IoTSettings
IoTSettings.label: Io T Settings
IoTSettings.description: Represents IoTSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableIoT.description: enable Io T field of IoTSettings metadata component.

enableIoTInsightsPilot.description: enable Io T Insights Pilot field of IoTSettings metadata component.

enableIoTUsageEmail.description: enable Io T Usage Email field of IoTSettings metadata component.
